title: Not standing opposite Kareena Kapoor in ‘Udta Punjab’: Alia Bhatt
text: OMG! Mira Rajput Avoids her Hubby Shahid Kapoor's Ex Kareena Kapoor? 01:18 Shahid Kapoor recently revealed that Mira Rajput doesn't go to the same gym as his ex-flame Kareena Kapoor while it's him (Shahid) who does and has also met Bebo and her husband Saif Ali Khan many a times there. So is Mira avoiding the chance meet with Kareena by not going to the same gym as Shahid?...
